50 minute recital performed as my capstone project for my music major.

Program:

Etude for Piano No 16 - Philip Glass

Prelude and Fugue in C-Sharp Minor, Op. 87, No 10 - Dmitri Shostakovich

Sonata for Piano in E Major, Op. 109 - Ludwig Van Beethoven

The Reminiscents - Paul Gabriel L. Cosme

Ballade No. 3 in A-Flat Major, Op. 47 - Frederic Chopin
